text: Linda Ellerbee (born August 15, 1944) is an American journalist. She worked for Nick News with Linda Ellerbee. She also worked on NBC News. At NBC, she worked on The Today Show. She was born in Bryan, Texas. ==References== Category:American television presenters Category:Journalists from Texas Category:Television personalities from Texas Category:1944 births Category:Living people
title: Linda Ellerbee
